title: Order MLflow Experiment Logging Steps
description: Arrange the MLflow experiment tracking steps in the correct order to set up an experiment, log parameters, train a model, and log metrics.
hints: Start by setting up the experiment context
Parameters are logged before training begins
Metrics are computed after the model runs
optimalSolution:
mlflow.set_experiment('/experiments/my_model')
with mlflow.start_run():
    mlflow.log_param('learning_rate', 0.01)
    model = train_model(data, learning_rate=0.01)
    mlflow.log_metric('accuracy', accuracy)
explanation: MLflow experiment tracking follows a logical flow: set experiment → start run → log parameters → train → log metrics. This order ensures reproducibility since parameters are captured before training and metrics after evaluation.
